outputs.output_descr: Building on the Leadership Development Programme and CCE-CC efforts undertaken in collaboration with Ministry of Local Government, UNDP is committed to scaling up the national response to HIV & AIDS through supporting the Government in strengthening HIV prevention and improving access to services in the country.  Strengthened prevention efforts focused to contribute to a reduction of the incidence, address fear, stigma and discrimination, and support advocacy for the Human Rights of all people infected and affected by HIV & AIDS in Lesotho; as well as assist in the comprehension of some of the key cultural and social drivers of the epidemic in Lesotho.

Building on the Leadership Development Programme and CCE-CC efforts undertaken in collaboration with Ministry of Local Government, UNDP is committed to scaling up the national response to HIV & AIDS through supporting the Government in strengthening HIV prevention and improving access to services in the country.  Strengthened prevention efforts focused to contribute to a reduction of the incidence, address fear, stigma and discrimination, and support advocacy for the Human Rights of all people infected and affected by HIV & AIDS in Lesotho; as well as assist in the comprehension of some of the key cultural and social drivers of the epidemic in Lesotho.
